# local constants

```{r constants}

#calib_path <- paste0("Data/KBS/Calibration/")
#mgmt_path <- paste0("Data/KBS/Management/")
#wth_path <- paste0("Data/KBS/Weather/")
calib_folder <- paste0("Calibration/")
mgmt_folder <- paste0("Management/")
wth_folder <- paste0("Weather/")

treatment_list <- c("T1","T2","T3")
treatment_num_list <- c(1,2,3)

# 9-color palette with grey and black. Colors in order are:
#[1]black, [2]dark blue, [3]green, [4]light blue, [5]grey,
#[6]pink, [7]red, [8]orange, [9]yellow
cbPalette9 <- c("#000000","#0072B2","#009E73","#56B4E9","#999999",
                "#CC79A7","#D55E00","#E69F00","#F0E442")

```

# reduce data

```{r reduce_data}

MaizeYld_Mgha <- ObsYield[ObsYield$Treatment %in% treatment_list & ObsYield$crop=="Maize",
                          c("year","Treatment","mean_yield")]

SoyYld_Mgha <- ObsYield[ObsYield$Treatment %in% treatment_list & ObsYield$crop=="Soybean",
                          c("year","Treatment","mean_yield")]

WheatYld_Mgha <- ObsYield[ObsYield$Treatment %in% treatment_list & ObsYield$crop=="Wheat",
                          c("year","Treatment","mean_yield")]

SoilBD_gcc <- ObsBD[ObsBD$Treatment %in% c(treatment_list, control_treatment),
                    c("year","Treatment","mean_BD")]

Cstock_Mgha <- ObsC_Mgha_all[ObsC_Mgha_all$treatment %in% 
                               c(treatment_num_list,control_treatment_num),
                         c("year","treatment","mean_cpct","cstock")]

SoilTemp_C <- ObsTemp_all[ObsTemp_all$treatment %in% treatment_list,
                      c("date","year","treatment","soil_temperature")]

SoilMoist_VSM <- ObsVSM_mean[ObsVSM_mean$treatment %in% treatment_list,
                        c("date","year","treatment","mean_VSM")]

CO2_ghaday <- ObsGas_all[ObsGas_all$Treatment %in% c(treatment_list, control_treatment),
                     c("date","year","Treatment","CO2_C")]

N2O_ghaday <- ObsGas_all[ObsGas_all$Treatment %in% treatment_list,
                     c("date","year","Treatment","N2O_N")]

MB_gm2 <- ObsMB_all[ObsMB_all$trt %in% c(treatment_list, control_treatment),
                    c("year","trt","mb_gm2")]

```

# Management stats
## Fertilizer

```{r}

fert_df <- read.csv(file=paste0(calib_folder,"RFertilizer.csv"))
ops_ext_adj_raw <- read_csv(paste0(mgmt_folder,adjusted_ops_filename),
                    col_names = TRUE, show_col_types=F)

fert_summary1 <- fert_df[fert_df$treatment %in% c("T1","T2","T3"),] %>%
  group_by(year,treatment) %>%
  summarize(tot_N=sum(n_rate_kg_ha),
            tot_P=sum(p_rate_kg_ha)) %>%
  arrange(year,treatment) # reorder all the records again

# add crop for the year (based on what is harvested that year)
fert_summary <- left_join(fert_summary1,
                          ops_ext_adj_raw[ops_ext_adj_raw$observation_type=="Harvest" &
                            ops_ext_adj_raw$crop %in% c("Maize","Soybean","Wheat"),
                            c("year","treatment","crop")],
                          by=c("year","treatment"))


  
  

```

# Weather

```{r}

historical_weather <- read_csv(paste0(wth_folder,"compiled_historical_weather.csv"),
                    col_names = TRUE, show_col_types=F) %>%
    mutate(date=as.Date(dayofyear,origin=paste0(as.character(year),"-01-01"))-1)

# temp
ObsATfit <- lm(tavg ~ date, data = historical_weather)
ObsATfit_coef <- coef(ObsATfit)
ObsATfit_r2 <- round(summary(ObsATfit)$r.squared,2)
airtemp_slope_byday <- ObsATfit_coef[2]

gAT <- historical_weather %>%
ggplot(aes(x=date, y=tavg, color=treatment, show.legend=TRUE)) +
  geom_line() +
  geom_abline(intercept=ObsATfit_coef[1], slope=ObsATfit_coef[2], color="red") +
  ggtitle(paste0(site_name," Observed Mean Air Temperature")) +
  xlab("Year") +
  ylab(expression('Temperature (' ^o*'C)')) +
  theme(panel.background = element_blank(),
        axis.line = element_line(),
        legend.position = "right",
        legend.key = element_blank())

gAT

ObsATfit2 <- lm(tavg ~ year, data = historical_weather)
ObsATfit_coef2 <- coef(ObsATfit2)
airtemp_slope_byyear <- ObsATfit_coef2[2]

# rain
ObsPfit <- lm(rain_cm.x ~ date, data = historical_weather)
ObsPfit_coef <- coef(ObsPfit)
ObsPfit_r2 <- round(summary(ObsPfit)$r.squared,2)
rain_slope_byday <- ObsPfit_coef[2]

gP <- historical_weather %>%
ggplot(aes(x=date, y=rain_cm.x, color=treatment, show.legend=TRUE)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_abline(intercept=ObsPfit_coef[1], slope=ObsPfit_coef[2], color="red") +
  ggtitle(paste0(site_name," Observed Precipitation")) +
  xlab("Year") +
  ylab(expression('Rain (cm)')) +
  theme(panel.background = element_blank(),
        axis.line = element_line(),
        legend.position = "right",
        legend.key = element_blank())

gP

ObsPfit2 <- lm(rain_cm.x ~ year, data = historical_weather)
ObsPfit_coef2 <- coef(ObsPfit2)
rain_cm_slope_byyear <- ObsPfit_coef2[2]


```
